message:
Hi guys, 
I am working on project that I need to upload image to imgur.com, I wrote the method which do that, but it didn't work when it came to posting part (actually no exception thrown or any types of warning appears)! so, any suggestions?
thanks.

data.message: What is the response string you're getting? I mean the responseContent variable you're getting?
If you have a http debugger, like FIddler, you can see what is happening on the wire, may be the picture is too big and it is being uploaded for a long time.
همممم، مش عارف، مش عاوز اكون غلس، بس مش ده سؤال فى كود و مكانه الأفضل فى SOF ؟
was the image converted to a base64 string?

after looking at this example : https://github.com/eirikb/gifie/blob/gh-pages/app.js
now i can see the problem is the API is expecting JSON data in the request body, so you need to make the Content-Type: application/json
and the body : {
image: "data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7",
type: "base64"
}
* This works for me and uploaded a tiny 1x1 px gif image using cURL ;)
thank you Eslam, I will give it another try.
Suggestion: dump JS and use Python, you will  get meaningful exceptions
